collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: Music and ballet (Radio program). no. 1-348; Feb. 4, 1937-Sept. 26, 1943.
pageContext.collection_description: Transcripts of the radio program presented on radio station WQXR, New York. From Dec. 7, 1941 to Sept. 26, 1943, the program was called Music for the theatre.
